title: nEram konjamum illaiyO nIla mayil
sahitya:
nEram konjamum illaiyO nIla mayil tOghai shUDum 
bAlakrSNanukku ennai ninaikkat-tAn nenjamillaiyO


anupallavi

  dhIramODu gOpiyar mAmanai tiruDi kaLaviDa nEram 
cinnam shiru porikkALanAi uralODu tirindu tavazhndiDa nEram
kanroDu karavaigaL shUzhndiDa gAnam alainda nEram 
kara kankaNam oliyiDa kuzhal gAnam payinra nEram
marakatamaNi ashaindADa kuNDalam ishaindADa
vambu sheidu kALiyan mishai tOm tOm enru kuditta nEram


caraNam    uyarak-kaTTi vaitta tayiraiyum pAlaiyum ural Erik-kaLavADa nEramum uNDu 
Udu kuzhalUkki mAdoruttiyODu OyAdu konjiDa nEram uNDu
ayanODu indran mudalAna pErkellAm aruL sheidu pEshiDa nEram uNDu
adhikam shollap-pOnAl ennaiyanri maTrum Araiyum eNNiDa nEram uNDu
AyarODu kulamurai uravADi aruLa nEram uNDu antaranga mAmunivar cintaiyura nEram uNDu
mAyat-tiraiyai eDuttu mUDi maraittuk-koLLa nEram uNDu mAnam pOghum pOdu vandu dAnamIya nEram uNDu
